body.name: Camping Fan with LED Lantern, 20000mAh 9-inch Rechargeable Battery Operated Portable Tent Fan with Dual Motor, Quiet and Strong Wind, Hang Hook, Perfect Outdoor USB Fan for Picnic, Barbecue, Fishing
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 5 hrs 22 mins
features: ✔【13-58 Hours Working Time】- Unlike other subpar products in the market, our camping fan has built-in upgraded 20000mAh rechargeable battery, the longest working time is up to 58 hours, bringing you longer-lasting coolness. Now, you don't need to wake up in the middle of the night to recharge the fan or change the battery.

✔【Quiet but Powerful Dual Motor】- Say goodbye to those noisy fans that make you unable to sleep well! Our rechargeable camping fan adopts unique brushless Dual Motor Technology, which increases the strong airflow output by 80% compared with other products on the market, while greatly reducing the noise, bringing long-lasting comfort for your sleep and work in summer.

✔【3 Level Brightness LED Light】- 2 in 1 Camping tent fan with 3 levels of adjustable brightness, ideal for night camping or hiking. The lowest brightness gives a soft but not harsh glow, and the maximum brightness can easily illuminate the entire area. With it, there is no need to buy additional camping lanterns, making your hiking experience more convenient.

✔【20000mAh Mobile Power Bank】- Our 3-in-1 portable travel fan is powered by an advanced 20000mAh high-capacity rechargeable battery that is higher quality, safer, more reliable, and lasts longer. It has a USB-A port, which means it can be used as an emergency backup power source for your phone, flashlight, and laptop. Relieving your worries about battery life, it is one of the must-haves for outdoor travel.

✔【Designed for Camping】- Our camping light fan is equipped with a hidden hook design at the bottom, which can be easily hung on the top of the tent or on the branches without taking up too much space. It uses USB charging, support 2A fast charge, can be fully charged within 6 hours. In addition, it also supports working while charging, and does not generate heat during use, which is also safe for children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect portable fan!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased my fan about 6 months ago. After charging, it worked great and maintained a charge much longer than anticipated. The output is fantastic! My son kept "stealing" my fan and even took it with him to college. Yes, I purchased another for him for Christmas and it too is of great quality. If you are looking for a portable fan, this is the one! It has been a surprising find.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best fans and customer service on Amazon
reviews.reviewText: I bought a green fan. It wasn't working as expected because the fan wasn't working longer than 5 hours solely on batteries. So when they messaged me requesting feedback I told them I was dissatisfied. Without any hesitation they sent a replacement because the original purchase was defective. I received the replacement and now I am completely satisfied. It charges fast so I don't have to wait longer than 3 hours to get a full charge. Also the fan is so powerful it makes a very hot room feel like a extremely cool environment. The light is so bright that it can light up an entire room. The fan lasts longer than 13 hours on a full charge. Even with two light indicators it lasted for more than five hours. I am completely satisfied with the quality of the service and how the fan works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fan to use on a cruise
reviews.reviewText: We used this fan for the first time in late Sept 2023 on a cruise in the Caribbean and it worked perfectly. It is a bit bulky to pack in a suitcase but only adds a pound or two. Airflow is good on medium and high when using as a night time sleeping fan, and the battery lasted all night (7 hours) as well with some still left. The fan is on the quieter side and so we brought a noise machine with us. The two together were perfect. We'll be bringing it again for another cruise in six months. We've also used it as a stroller fan to cool down our kiddo and which again it worked perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have 2 of these and use them camping. Work great, battery lasts over 7hrs on low easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 33 hours and 20 mins on lowest
reviews.reviewText: Bought this myself and not a paid review.As per reported by another user, did not get the advertised 58hrs of run time. Running the fan on the lowest possible setting, i got 33hrs and 20 mins of run time from a full battery (i ran the fan 31hrs continuously and followed by another 2hrs and 20 mins after a couple of hours break).For this i'm rating it as 4/5 since it fell short of the advertised time. I suspect the reason for this is that even though on its lowest setting, the fan speed is actually really strong (i think it has to do with the variable potential meter used to control the fan speed). On mine at the lowest setting, the wind speed is about the same as a Dyson fan at setting 4, so that could be the cause of the reduced battery life. Still good enough for my use case as a fan when im outdoors for this summer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend this little powerful thing
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I absolutely love my little pan. It will shock you how much power it has. It also has a nice bright, flashlight that has three different shades and charging for your phone and the battery last a long time for this little fan. I took it on my cruise and now it’s an every day use in my house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Would have given 5 starts but . . .
reviews.reviewText: The 1st unit I received didn't work 100%. Unit arrived charged so it did turn on, but only one of the two blades worked (spun around) and the onboard light didn't work either. I went back to the Amazon site to get a replacement and took the bad unit back to a KOHLS store that night I got it.Amazon did me right because I received a replacement THE NEXT DAY!Unit #2 came charged up.PROS: Both sets of blades and the onboard light worked as it should.Fan was quiet as advertised but to be honest I'll be using the fan for when I play with my band so fan noise was never a selling point to me.Brightness of light was pretty decent although I did try it out in a lit room.The air breeze it generated was a good flow. I like that you can vary the fan speed to your liking.It came with a USB to USB-C cable but did not include a wall charger. Fan has two USB ports on it: USB and USB-C. Not sure if you can charge a phone from it. Nothing on the box or the instructions indicates such...CONS: The instruction manual I found to be completely lacking. Please forgive me but it was like broken English transcribed to print. It basically contained all the info printed on the box with no other specific details. I basically had to tinker around to see how to work it.Gave it 4 stars because no real good instructions were given and the 1st fan I got didn't work right.
